greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Remainder when Fibonacci(n) is divided by prime(n).
link: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = F(n) mod prime(n), where F(n) is the n-th Fibonacci number and prime(n) is the n-th prime number.
maple: seq(combinat[fibonacci](n) mod ithprime(n), n=1..1000); # _Robert Israel_, Dec 24 2014
program: (MAGMA) [Fibonacci(n) mod NthPrime(n): n in [1..120]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2015
xref: Cf. A000040, A000045, A075702 (locations of 0 in this sequence), A121104.
results.author: _Randy L. Ekl_, Jun 20 2002
